'''Marion Zimmer Bradley''' ([[3 June]] [[1930]] â€” [[25 September]] [[1999]]), an American author of fantasy novels, also published some works relating to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and his [[legendarium]].

==Bibliography, selected==

*[[1961]]: ''[[A Meeting in the Hyades]]''
*[[1961]]: ''[[Men, Halflings and Hero Worship]]''
*[[1974]]: ''[[The Jewel of Arwen]]''
*[[1974]]: ''[[The Parting of Arwen]]''
*[[1976]]: ''[[The Middle-Earth Songbook]]''
*[[1985]]: ''[[The Best of Marion Zimmer Bradley]]'' (include "[[The Jewel of Arwen]]")
